title: How to Install an ARIES 4" Bull Bar on a Ram 1500
description: See what you need to mount your fierce front-end protection and follow along to the step-by-step instructions.
tags: Aries, Bull Bar, Dodge Ram 1500, 4" Big Horn

asset.title: ARIES Bull Bar Install: 4" Big Horn 45-5005 on Ram 1500
asset.description:
This video demonstrates the installation of the ARIES 45-5005 4" Big Horn Bull Bar on a 2015 Ram 1500.  This bull bar is available in steel with a 304 stainless steel finish or aluminum with a textured black powder coat finish.

Features Include:
Allows for addition of aftermarket lights
Removable skid plate
No-drill application

Part #
45-5005 (Stainless Steel Finish)
AL45-5005 (Aluminum with Textured Black Powder Coat Finish)
asset.author: ARIES Automotive
